SignIn.........................................................passed Then Click on the Woven Modules.............................................passed Then Click on Audit module..................................................passed Then Click on IPO List module...............................................passed When Clicked on Add IPO button..............................................passed And Verify whether the page is navigating to the Add IPO screen or not......passed When Click on the save button...............................................passed And Verify the information tags data on mouse hover.........................passed And Verify whether current date is displayed or not bydefault...............passed Given Enter first two letters of a Buyer Style..............................passed And Select a Buyer Style from the dropdown..................................passed Given Enter the IPO name....................................................passed Given Enter first two letters of Production Merchant........................passed Then Select a Production Merchant fron the dropdown.........................passed Given Enter the PO Qty......................................................passed Given Enter IPO percentage..................................................passed Then Click in the Assigned Month and Year field.............................passed Then Select the Month from the month picker.................................passed Then Select Exfactory Date..................................................passed And Check the Active field
